data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Misamis Oriental to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Misamis Oriental, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Misamis Oriental.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Misamis Oriental, Philippines need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Misamis Oriental.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, help the 123,780 believers in Misamis Oriental to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 764,819 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Misamis Oriental.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Misamis Oriental, Philippines know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

location.name: Misamis Oriental
location.cities_list: Cagayan de Oro, Mariano, Bugo, Tagoloan, Jasaan
